QuestData.Title: Boar Training: Riplash
QuestData.Description: This boar is at home in the rocky plains of Gorgrond, so it will be easier to train. As with other beasts, we will begin the training in the place it calls home.$B$BTest your boar against the great predator Riplash, a raptor known to hunt boars.
QuestData.LogDescription: Defeat Riplash while riding your Boar-In-Training.
